joshua.body: Joshua is a 28 years old electrical engineering student living in Cologne together with his student colleague Sebastian
joshua.summary: A charismatic and funny young man who is known to get his shit straight
joshua.title: Joshua

kim.body: Kim Müller is a 27 years old woman from Berlin, following her PhD studies in Biochemistry. A brilliant student with a promising career that she is, she is tackling one of the most intresting topics in current life science research: schizophrenia. Her stumbling into the other world turns her world upside down - and confronts her with ever new challenges.
kim.summary: Kim has grown to become a dedicated and ambitious scientist, unravelling the mysteries of biology to understand the defect mechanisms of a mental disorder that is far too familiar to her. But there will be an even bigger challenge up ahead her path.
kim.title: Kim
